title: How to get Healed at Demon Farm - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Children   Angels   Animal Rearing   Artifacts   Beasts   Caring Protagonist   Childcare   Cute Children   Cute Story   Demi-Humans   Demon Lord   Demons   Dungeons   Fairies   Familial Love   Familiars   Farming   Game Elements   Gate to Another World   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Magic   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Naive Protagonist   Poor to Rich   Post-apocalyptic   Spirits   Summoning Magic   System Administrator   Tsundere   Weak to Strong
author: Watt   왓트
description:
An era in which the rift and Awakened, dungeons and the Demons became daily life.

I, an incompletely awakened person was struggling to find a job to fulfil my daily needs.

One day suddenly i got a job on a suspicious farm. and… … .

[You are awaken as a ‘Demon beast guardian’.]
A demon farm full of cute and unique demons.

Thus began my, happy healing story !>
